import React, {useState} from "react"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; function CreatePage(){ const customStylingDiv = { width: '200px' } const [voucher,setvoucher] = useState({ name:'', email:'', redemptions:'', created_at:'', expires_at:'', pin:'' }) const postNewVoucher = async () => { const name = 'ReactTestVoucher4' const email = 'react4@mail.com' const redemptions = 4 const created_at = new Date() const expires_at = '2024-02-29' const pin = "1357" const body = {name,email,redemptions,created_at,expires_at,pin } const endpooint = 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/mkevoucher/' const response = await axios.post(endpooint,body) console.log(response) console.log(response.data) return response.data } const sendHandler = async () => { const newData = await postNewVoucher() } return(

Create Voucher





) } export default CreatePage
